testcase.name: GET method
testcase.system-out: Given Call a GET api to "http://192.168.99.139:3003/product" with query strings page="1" and limit="21".passed Then status code should be "200"............................................passed And number of records should equal to "21"..................................passed

testcase.name: POST method
testcase.system-out: Given Call a POST request to "http://192.168.99.139:3003/payment" with request body name="test" email="" and phone="" and address="" and products="".passed Then status code should be "400"............................................passed Then result should tell us "phone is required"..............................passed
